segments.text: My attention shifts from the flooding sink to the other side of the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a boy on a two-step stool, precariously balanced.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching high into an open cabinet, clearly aiming for something.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Ah, the "COOKIE JAR" label is visible inside!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He has one hand inside, grabbing cookies, while the other holds a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is a classic secret mission, isn't it?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His younger sister stands nearby, eyes wide with anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has her arm raised, palm open, waiting for her share of the loot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks so unstable; it could tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't fall and hurt himself or break the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are so engrossed in their little scheme, it's quite charming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thrill of forbidden cookies is clearly a powerful motivator.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They don't seem to notice the overflowing sink either, which is interesting.
segments.speaker: PAR
